page.title: 12RECREATION 2
page.content: {HOBBIES.}Knitting,sewing and embroidery are the main hobbies of the people interviewed for our survey.Other hobbies include photography,sketching,painting,letter- writing,walking,dancing,bingo,corn dolly making,listening to music,golf,darts,riding,pool,dominoes, cricket and swimming. {SPORT.}Very few people were participants in sporting activities.Many enjoyed watching others,mostly on television. Tennis,croquet,football,cricket,were the sports most people took part in. Some of the young people played pool,darts and table tennis at the Youth Club in the village hall.
